title: 白宫网站恢复请继续投共匪为恐怖组织
contents:
⚠️中國人民解放軍已經進入香港！
The PLA has entered into Hong Kong!

請將共產黨列為恐怖組織！
Please recognise the CCP as a terrorist organisation！

白宮請願簽名鏈接：
https://t.co/6oJV3hB4pL

感謝！Thank you！ https://t.co/Puy6UAnOIR

白宫请愿签名链接：
https://petitions.whitehouse.gov/petition/call-official-recognition-chinese-communist-party-terrorist-organization
